title: Is my game being drop hacked? Pic included
body: My whole team being dc'd and i dunno if this is significant but it says someone on the enemy team has un paused the game?

replies.body: don't you just love it when you die to buffs because of dc

Ok so actually have to clarify 1 thing real quick. The game did in fact just disappear and I did not loose my promos as a result of this  phantom 'drop hack' (if thats what happened) thing. What happened was i check my profile which said g2 91LP so i just assumed i lost the series because of it. When in actuality because it was g3 of the series and i had lost a game, the profile sort of records a lost game within a series as an lp loss. 

Went on to win the next game and I'm g1 now!
this happens when ranked servers go down

Hey Ger1sh

Thanks for the report.  We take this kind of thing very seriously, as activity like this impacts the competitive integrity of the game.  We'll will be investigating this.

PS: Congrats on winning your promos! :)
That's interesting, why is it that games that are drophacked are seen as "activity like this impacts the competitive integrity of the game." but feeders and afkers arent to actually be dealt with.

Hey Bapitixo

We actually do take feeding and afk very seriously too.  We've got quite a few active systems along that front to help out, and you can read about them in our [Player Behaviour FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq)

TL;DR - We have feeder detection in place for intentional feeding, and LeaverBuster in place for those who frequently leave games.
